tasks.task: Explain and demonstrate the functionality and installation of a K-Rain 4000 series indexing valve.
subtasks: Describe the design features of the indexing valve, including fewer moving parts, longer lifespan, and water-pressure activation.
Explain the installation options for the valve (above ground in a valve box or direct burial).
Compare the 4000 series valve models (four and six zones) and their respective outlet numbers.
Differentiate between the sizes of the 4000 series (one inch and one and a quarter inch).
Discuss the process of changing the cam to adjust the number of zones and the importance of replacing with the correct cam for the desired configuration.
Demonstrate how to replace the cam by removing retaining screws, prying out the current cam, inserting the new cam with alignment of the stem and divot, and reinstalling the screws.
Explain the cycling mechanism of the indexing valve and how it progresses through zones.
Provide installation instructions emphasizing the use of multi-purpose glue for capping unnecessary outlets due to ABS plastic material.
Summarize installation considerations, such as ensuring proper controller compatibility and basic electrical setup (controller and control valve or pump).
Share product recommendation and sales channel (sprinklerwarehouse.com) for purchasing the valve.
Encourage customer service interaction for support and promote the YouTube channel for additional education.
